title: Ishi
html: ISHI(Ishʹi) [shortened form of Isaiah, meaning “Salvation of Jehovah”].1. A descendant of Judah; son of Appaim and father of Sheshan.—1Ch 2:3, 31.2. Another descendant of Judah.—1Ch 4:1, 20.3. A leader and family head of the half tribe of Manasseh that lived E of the Jordan.—1Ch 5:23, 24.4. A Simeonite whose four sons are noted in the Chronicles for having led 500 to victory against the Amalekites living in Mount Seir.—1Ch 4:42, 43.
